channel.title: 2 questions about 508 source that i have
channel.description: how do i change the prices, because im using david scape, and all of them are like 5 gp and p hats are 5k, my second question is, when me and a couple of people on my server, it keeps dcing, then i log in again, about 05 to 10 mins later does it again any help on both of these questions thanks

item.title: 2 questions about 508 source that i have
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

#1: I think it’s in the item configuration file

#2: Most 508 bases (Scratch that, pretty much all RSPS’s bases) are very poorly programmed. There could be multiple things causing it.

Read full topic
item.source: 2 questions about 508 source that i have
